panels.description: The rate of the committed round number.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}[$interval]))

sum(rate(aptos_chain_health_backoff_triggered{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Committed blocks per sec

panels.description: The rate of the committed transaction version.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Committed successful txns per sec

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Participating voting power % in last 100 rounds (~20m stale)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_committed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role",state="failed"}[$interval])

rate(aptos_consensus_committed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role",state="retry"}[$interval])

rate(aptos_consensus_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the leader signs it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to signed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node receives it in consensus.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="network_received"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="network_received"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to network receive

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node receives it in consensus.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="round_manager_received"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="round_manager_received"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to round manager receive

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node is synced and ready to execute.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="synced"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="synced"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to synced

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node votes for it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="voted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="voted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to vote

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the QC is aggregated by leader.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_aggregated"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_aggregated"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to QC aggregated

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node adds the QC.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_added"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_added"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to QC received

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node ordered the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to ordered

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node executes the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to executed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node commits it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to commit

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{op='process_proposal', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{op='process_proposal', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{op='process_vote', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{op='process_vote', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_sync_info', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_sync_info', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_local_timeout', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_local_timeout', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='verify_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='verify_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_different_epoch_consensus_msg', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_different_epoch_consensus_msg', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_epoch_proof', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_epoch_proof', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{op='process_epoch_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{op='process_epoch_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='reconfig', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='reconfig', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.description: A sampled binary number indicating whether the node is currently in a function. (Useful when the node is stuck somewhere)

targets.expr: consensus_gauge{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", op=~".*_running"}

panels.title: Main Event Loop Current running function

panels.description: A sampled binary number indicating whether the node is currently in a function. (Useful when the node is stuck somewhere)

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_buffer_manager_retry_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

panels.title: Buffer Manager Retry count

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_qc_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Timeout rounds per sec

panels.description: The total number a single node has timeout locally. When 2f+1 nodes have local timeout for the same round, a timeout round is formed.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Total local timeout

panels.description: The duration of a single round until it generates local timeout.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_round_timeout_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round timeout value

panels.description: The current epoch number the node is in, the number is bumped with reconfiguration event like key rotation, validator set change etc.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Number of validators for the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Number of validators

panels.description: Total voting power of the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} / 100000000

panels.title: Total voting power

panels.description: Pending blocks in the block tree.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_num_blocks_in_tree{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - 1

panels.title: Pending blocks

panels.description: The average number of transactions of a block, can impact the execution time and overall latency.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_num_txns_per_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_num_txns_per_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Transactions per block

panels.description: Total time the node has to wait before inserting the block

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_wait_duration_s_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Wait duration per sec

panels.description: Pending blocks in the pipeline

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, aptos_consensus_num_blocks_in_pipeline{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) by (stage)

panels.title: Pending blocks in pipeline

targets.expr: consensus_gauge{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", op="back_pressure"}
consensus_gauge{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", op="sync_only"}

panels.description: The average time to execute a block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='execute_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='execute_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Execute block Latency

panels.description: The average time to commit blocks (may commit more than 1 in a single call).

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='commit_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='commit_block',  kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Commit block Latency

panels.description: The average time to execute a block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='execute_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

quantile(0.67, rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='commit_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Execute/Commit block per second

panels.description: The average latency of talking to safety rules (of all calls).

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='safety_rules', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='safety_rules', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Safety rules Latency

panels.description: The average latency of notifying state sync of committed txn.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_state_sync', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_state_sync', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Notify state sync Latency

panels.description: The average latency of pulling the txn from mempool.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='pull_txn', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='pull_txn', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Pull txn Latency

panels.description: The average latency of notifying mempool about failed transactions.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_mempool', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_mempool', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Failed txn notify mempool Latency

panels.description: The total count of call to sync to.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='sync_to', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: State sync count per sec

panels.description: The total number of block retrieval the node sends. It's required when the node is missing some ancestors of the block to be executed.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Block retrieval count per sec

panels.description: Total time spent in retrieval the blocks from peers. (This is blocking RPC call)

targets.expr: consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Total time spent on block retrieval

panels.description: The total time spent in the external sync_to function.

targets.expr: consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", op='sync_to', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Total time spent on state sync

panels.description: The proposal rate of the node, indicating how many times it becomes leaders.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_proposals_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Proposals rate

panels.description: The total number the node votes on a NIL block when the round timeout. (when the proposer doesn't send proposal in time).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_vote_nil_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Nil block per sec

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Network -> Consensus pending messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Epoch Manager pending messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Round manager pending messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Block retrieval  pending messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Network -> Consensus Enqueue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Network -> Consensus Dequeue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Epoch manager Enqueue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval])

panels.title: Epoch manager Dequeue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Epoch manager Dropped rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus block retrieval (dedicated channel for the rpc).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block retrieval Enqueue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus block retrieval (dedicated channel for the rpc).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block retrieval Dequeue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus block retrieval (dedicated channel for the rpc).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block retrieval Dropped rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval])

panels.title: Round manager Enqueue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval])

panels.title: Round manager Dequeue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_round_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Round manager Dropped rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_buffer_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace="$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Buffer manager Enqueue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_buffer_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster",namespace="$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval])

panels.title: Buffer manager Dequeue rate

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_buffer_manager_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Buffer manager Dropped rate

panels.description: The pending messages in the self message queue (for proposal and vote) and timeout queue (for local timeout).

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_pending_self_messages{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Pending self message

panels.description: The pending messages in the self message queue (for proposal and vote) and timeout queue (for local timeout).

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_pending_round_timeouts{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Pending round local timeouts

panels.description: The pending messages in the self message queue (for proposal and vote) and timeout queue (for local timeout).

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_pending_state_sync_notification{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Pending state sync notification

panels.description: The number of messages sent group by types

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_sent_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Consensus Message Sent

panels.description: The number of messages received group by types

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_received_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Consensus Message Received

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for the same ledger info collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_most_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for proposal

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for all other (conflicting) ledger infos collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_conflicting_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for conflicting

panels.description: Voting power of timeout votes collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_timeout_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for timeout votes

panels.description: Participating in consensus in leader election window (either voted in last num_validators rounds, or proposed in last 10*num_validators rounds)

targets.expr: clamp_max(aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}, 1)

panels.title: Participating in consensus

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} / clamp_min(aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}, 1)

panels.title: Proposal failure rate

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating voting power % in consensus

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating nodes % in consensus
